group.label: Fraud via Stripe Radar
group.comment:
Stripe Radar uses machine learning to automatically review your orders for fraud and automatically block many high-risk payments. Even if a card is new to your business, there's an 89% chance its already been seen on the Stripe network.

Looking for enhanced fraud detection? You can create custom fraud detection rules right in the Stripe dashboard with Radar for Fraud Teams. Learn more about Stripe Radar.

field.label: Hold elevated risk orders
field.comment: If Stripe Radar marks a payment with Elevated Risk status, the order will be placed On Hold until it is reviewed.
